item.title: Azure Firewall's Auto Learn SNAT Routes: A Guide to Dynamic Routing and SNAT Configuration
item.description:
Introduction
Azure Firewall is a cloud-native network security service that protects your Azure virtual network resources. It is a fully stateful firewall as a service with built-in high availability and unrestricted cloud scalability. However, some Azure Firewall customers may face challenges when they need to configure non-RFC-1918 address spaces to not SNAT through the Azure Firewall. This can cause issues with routing, connectivity, and performance.
